title: Unavailable?
body:
I was just in the middle of a League match and I like suddenly just kind of stopped and it said I was attempting to reconnect but I couldn't, so I exited and was going to reload. It said the pvp client crashed and now every time I go to launch League it says that it's unavailable. Has anyone else had this issue, specifically kind of around the same time as me? (it's 7 AM right now) My main concern is the fact that I was in the middle of a game when it shut down and I don't want to get banned.
(also i'm sorry if this is the wrong board but i've not used the boards before!)

replies.body: There were some server issues last night so loss prevented was activated and ranked queues were disabled.  Server maintenance began a bit after which caused some downtime until it was complete.  We will provide updates on issues and maintenance on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Everything should be good to go and online now, but please let me know if you have any issues.
